description: PitchPower helps freelancers, agencies and professional services firms make new business easier. Designed by sales pros, PitchPower improves piepline velocity and conversion and works for both new business and account management. Free trial.
title: New Business Made Easier | PitchPower
introduction: PitchPower.ai is an online solution for business-to-business professionals that generates high-quality proposals for services using AI. It is a simple workflow tool designed for freelancers, agencies, and service firms to streamline their prospecting, pitching, and proposing processes. The tool captures information about the user and uses AI to make connections between the user and potential opportunities.
features: Talent Finder service for recruitment and access to insight professionals
Turn client briefs into well-formatted proposals quickly

faqs.question: Why was PitchPower.ai created?
faqs.answer: PitchPower.ai was created to provide business-to-business professionals with a tool that generates high-quality proposals for services using AI.

faqs.question: What are the main features of PitchPower.ai?
faqs.answer: The main features include AI-powered proposal generation, basic profile setup, Talent Finder service for recruitment, and access to insight professionals.

faqs.question: Is PitchPower.ai safe to use with commercially sensitive information?
faqs.answer: Yes, PitchPower.ai is safe to use with commercially sensitive information.

faqs.question: How are payments handled?
faqs.answer: Payment handling details are not specified.

faqs.question: How does PitchPower.ai work?
faqs.answer: PitchPower.ai captures information about the user and uses AI to make connections between the user and potential opportunities.

faqs.question: Are there any limits to how I can use PitchPower.ai?
Why are there different tiers of access?
faqs.answer: Different tiers of access may offer varying levels of features and capabilities.

faqs.question: Do generated proposals belong to me?
faqs.answer: Yes, the generated proposals belong to the user.

faqs.question: What happens if I run into a problem?
faqs.answer: Support and troubleshooting options are not specified.
